jobDescription: The Data Analyst reports directly to the Manager, Service Analysis and will also work directly with the scheduling and service planning areas of the Planning department. This position is responsible for the technical database management and maintenance functions in support of the collection and compilation of data used to support strategic planning functions including synthesizing and analyzing data from multiple sources. Assist in performing analytical service planning, development tasks, and projects. Develop macros, modules and/or queries in support of the data analysis functions. This role also develops and maintains critical spreadsheets and data sets. The Data Analyst will be an inquisitive, self-starter who will engage staff across the agency to identify potential problems and propose solutions.SDL2017
